DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate efficacy characterize dose response relationship PD 0200390 subjective wake sleep onset subject primary insomnia .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double Blind , Parallel Group , Placebo Controlled , Multicenter Outpatient Trial Of PD 0200390 In Adults With Primary Insomnia
DOC.criteria: 3 month history primary insomnia ; 18 64 year For last 3 monthsregularly awake unrefreshed unrestored Difficulty initiate maintain sleep least 3 nights/week past month ( difficulty fall asleep , difficulty stay asleep , early awakening ) Any history Axis 1 psychiatric diagnosis ; History presence breathing related sleep disorder ; History presence medical neurological condition could interfere sleep Use alcohol sleep aid 2 standard drink consume per day 14 consume per week
